content: मंडलिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मंडल-इनि] {@--1@} Forming a circle, made up into a coil. {@--2@} Ruling a country. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A particular kind of snake. {@--2@} A snake in general. {@--3@} A cat. {@--4@} The pole-cat. {@--5@} A dog. {@--6@} The sun. {@--7@} The figtree. {@--8@} The ruler of a province.
